Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the village of Mamaroneck occupancy tax for two years
Summary: Extends the village of Mamaroneck occupancy tax for two years to 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 508 of the laws of 2016 amending the tax law relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax in the village of Mamaroneck, in relation to extending the expiration thereof
